name: Obsidian Beast - Obsidian Forge
text: When you activate this card: Target 1 Flip monster in your GY; Special Summon that monster in face-down Defense Position. If a card or effect is activated whilst you control a face-up monster: Change 1 face-up monster you control to face-down Defense Position, then flip the monster that was Special Summoned by this card face-up. You can only activate each effect of "Obsidian Beast - Obsidian Forge" once per turn.
